storyInfo: Everyone makes a choice about the future they want. Some sailors choose to return to town with Javier, while others sail out to sea with Thorns and Juana. Pascuala sets off to seek a good life.

attributes.content: This is the only intact salt ship left. The rest have taken damage, but there are plenty of salvageable parts.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: These are the blueprints, along with notes on their operations. And here's a map of the Salt Flat.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: I'll take everything! Think of the time we'll save if we can travel straight through the Salt Flat!
attributes.name: Excited Merchant

attributes.content: Name your price!
attributes.name: Excited Merchant

attributes.content: Here. Gold doblones only, no credit.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Deal!
attributes.name: Excited Merchant

attributes.content: Here you go. Is this enough?
attributes.name: Excited Merchant

attributes.content: Looks correct to me.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Well then, I'll be going! Have a good day, se√±ores.
attributes.name: Excited Merchant

attributes.content: He didn't even hesitate... Did we ask for too little?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: One second!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Er... is something the matter?
attributes.name: Excited Merchant

attributes.content: Javier catches up and climbs up the deck by rope.
I want to keep this helm wheel! How much? I'll pay you back.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: The helm wheel, of all things? It's the most important part of the ship.
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: Well, if you really want it‚Äî
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: I'll part with it for this much.
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: Now now, don't give that look! We had a deal. It's my ship now, right?
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: We do honest business here. It's only a question of whether you think it's worth the price!
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: Never mind then...
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: How unfortunate. Well, I hope to do business with you again!
attributes.name: Excited Merchant

attributes.content: Sailors! Roll call!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Here's the cash from selling the salt ship. Everyone gets an equal share.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Do whatever you want with it.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Here's your share, Rus.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Not sure what I wanna do with it.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Just make a choice. It's not hard.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: ...I wanted to leave Juana for stability. Then you turned out to be just as loco, so I figured we'd never have peace under you.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: And now I'm in this town, looking at the folks here, all thin and gaunt, their eyes like dead fins... This what peace looks like?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: And if I go anywhere else, how can I live a decent life when I've only ever been a pirate?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Go ahead and laugh, but I admire Teach. She's just a few years older, but she knows what she wants.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: When I saw her make up her mind to go with Juana, even with all those injuries... I wouldn't have had the guts.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Well, forget me, what about you?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Probably go somewhere else, open a restaurant.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Well... if that's what you want. I'm just gonna finish this smoke and get going.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Who can say for sure where the future lies, right?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Javier watches as the white sail of the salt ship disappears in the distance, as does Rus's silhouette.
He puts his own share in his pocket, and walks down the road.
How much for this?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: One silver piece.
attributes.name: Caravan Trader

attributes.content: What about this?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Same.
attributes.name: Caravan Trader

attributes.content: Hey, that's not half bad!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: I'll have this, this, and this. Put 'em on my car, the one behind me.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Sure thing! Where are you heading, with all this stuff?
attributes.name: Caravan Trader

attributes.content: I just bought whatever I wanted. What's wrong with that?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Oh, nothing at all! Just tell me if you want anything else, and I'll load it up for you!
attributes.name: Caravan Trader

attributes.content: That's more like it.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Clothes, accessories, trinkets... Feels like I'm still missing something.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: But what?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Whisper) ...Yeah, crazy, right?
attributes.name: Caravanner A

attributes.content: (Whisper) How was I supposed to know it'd turn out like that? Good heavens...
attributes.name: Caravanner B

attributes.content: (Hey, that buckle on his belt looks pretty nice... and shiny...)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Is it metal? Or gemstone? I want it...)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (I want it so bad...)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Whisper) ...They found it on the road and decided to dig it up. Thought it might fetch a few coins...
attributes.name: Caravanner A

attributes.content: (Whisper) They found a buyer? I can't believe it...
attributes.name: Caravanner B

attributes.content: (They haven't noticed me. And it's right there...)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Whisper) ...Can you believe they offered THAT much? Enough to set you up for life!
attributes.name: Caravanner A

attributes.content: (Whisper) Is that why we're heading that way?
attributes.name: Caravanner B

attributes.content: (Got it!)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Whisper) Yeah... we'll make it big in Columbia...
attributes.name: Caravanner A

attributes.content: (Make it big?)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Pascuala lets go, and the buckle falls back onto the man's belt.
What do you mean, make it big?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Caravanner A & B

attributes.content: Were you eavesdropping?
attributes.name: Caravanner A

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: I wouldn't have said anything if it were anyone else, but you two look pretty smart to me. A cut above the rest, you might say.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Which is why I mustered the courage to speak up.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Here's my fare. It's a long way to Columbia, so why don't you tell me more about it on the way?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Are we really going out to sea, se√±ora?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Can't believe I lived to see the day...
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Of course we are, Perlita. We're heading out to sea.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Incredible...
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Juana brushes her windswept hair and looks behind her.
Now we really have nothing left, Isidro, but my mind is set.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Will you be coming with us?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Se√±ora Juana...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Will you be my first mate?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Well. Alright then, captain, I'm ready to... huh?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: It seems my old friend is a little grumpy... Let's see if we can cheer her up.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: I suppose the new energy system is a bit much for a decades-old transmission core...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Hmm... Weedy already went back in her modified boat. Guess we'll have to fix it ourselves. What materials do we got?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Isidro, what's in that bulky bag you have there?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Things Elysium gave me. I'm not sure how helpful they'll be...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Well, open it up and we'll find out.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Isidro opens his backpack, and the contents spill out.
Juana and Teach lean forward and examine them.
Vitamins? Certainly useful at sea.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: And so are the radio equipment and waterproof boots...
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: These tools... they'll come in handy with the repairs.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Looks like we owe him one. None of these things would be easy to find out here.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I'm taking these two. Might be able to fix the problem.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: By the look on your face, I take it you didn't know? Did he hand you all this on the day we said goodbye?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: No... we didn't say goodbye that day.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: He's been giving me things from time to time since a while ago. I just stuffed everything into a bag.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: He knew.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Even before I did.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Of course he knew. He's your best buddy, isn't he?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Fixed it!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: We ready then? We can set sail?
attributes.name: Eager Sailor

attributes.content: Hey ho‚Äî
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: We're sailin'! We're sailin'!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Let's go, captain. It's time to set a course.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Isidro takes the spyglass from Juana.
Grains of salt stir upon the Flat like white waves, but he soon turns his eyes from that false sea to the sky on the horizon, to that one little streak of bright blue.
Standing on the bow by himself, he reaches out with his arm, and waits for the whirling light upon it to point the way.
He stands on the street, putting his palms together. The last speck of stardust has disappeared, and darkness takes over once again.
The fireworks is over? Is it time to go?
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: Let's go. Time to go home.
attributes.name: Surprised Passerby

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Aloof Passerby

attributes.content: The onlookers disperse. The crowd that had gathered because of him have left him again.
Receiving no answer from him, Juana steps forward, with Teach following behind her on the front deck.
One by one, the sailors gather, trying to see what their new captain is seeing.
A crowd forms around Isidro. Those who have fallen behind have to strain their necks and force their way through.
What is it, captain? What do you see?
attributes.name: Curious Sailor

attributes.content: Have you found which way to go?
attributes.name: Anxious Sailor

attributes.content: Which way is the sea? Are we sailing in the right direction?
attributes.name: Doubting Sailor

attributes.content: Isidro does not answer. His entire attention is focused upon his arm.
Why's it spinning?
attributes.name: Doubting Sailor

attributes.content: How long does this take? Where're we going?
attributes.name: Anxious Sailor

attributes.content: Ah... where will we go from here?
attributes.name: Curious Sailor

attributes.content: Patience, patience. Our captain will tell us the answer.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Now...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Which way do we go?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: At his question, the light on his arm converges, pointing towards the horizon, straight and firm.
He longs to sail towards the boundless ocean together with his friends. Thus, the Corazonix points out the direction for him.
Sailors cheer, rum is spilled‚Äî
Over yonder!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: The sea!
attributes.name: Eager Sailor

attributes.content: All eyes are upon Isidro.
Give the order, captain.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The sailors already have ropes in hand. Juana's hand is on the helm, waiting for his command.
Isidro takes a deep breath and takes in the eager eyes gazing upon him, filled with hopes and expectations, burdens that he is no longer afraid to bear.
He feels the wind of the Salt Flat. His shoulders are light.
Ahoy, sailors!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Anchors aweigh, hoist the sails‚Äî
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: ‚ÄîWe sail out to sea!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: To sea‚Äî
attributes.name: Sailors

attributes.content: Hey‚ÄîHo‚Äî!‚ô™
attributes.name: Sailors

attributes.text: High winds roar, our clothes a-tore‚ô™
Rain drowns our drunken haze, and lights our hearts ablaze‚ô™
Ready, ho! Sail forth! A thousand ships break port!‚ô™

attributes.content: I will wrestle the waves! I will sail the winds! I will fence the lightning‚Äî
attributes.name: Thrilled Sailor

attributes.content: I want to find the treasures buried at the bottom of the sea! All that shiny gold!
attributes.name: Eager Sailor

attributes.content: You know... I've been thinking... we all came together because we want to go out to sea...
attributes.name: Hesitant Sailor

attributes.content: So would we split up again if we have different ideas?
attributes.name: Hesitant Sailor

attributes.content: You're thinking that far ahead, chaval?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Whatever the future holds, we're together now, and we're going out to sea!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: So stop thinking too much and grab that rope!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Got some rum for you, Captain Isidro! Say something!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Isidro stands atop the bow. He can feel the air grow moist. It is an exciting feeling.
Into the distance.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: ...Mmph...
...Mmph... mmph...
What's that familiar sound?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...Mmph...
Mreep!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Nene?!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Nene! You're alive!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: (Eagerly licks Juana's cheeks)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Aww...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Are you coming out to sea with us?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: (Bounces around excitedly)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Oh, my sweet baby!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: A trail of blood leads from the steam to the depths of the boundless Salt Flat.
A cold tongue tastes the blood in the mouth. Broken limbs keep crawling, driven by a powerful desire that lives on without its master.
A short distance away, an appendage breaks through the salt layer, wiggling towards a sunlight it has not seen for many years. Then, a second, a third...
It is another powerful desire without a master, compelling the light-emitting organ to reach for the sun, as though trying to gain the sun's light.
All he wants is to live on. All it wants is to live on.
By whatever means. In whatever form.
The broken parts of Man and Seaborn struggle, wiggle, hungrily devouring each other.
They will walk this land in perpetuity.
